subject: refactor: replace hardcoded colors with theme references
body:
Replace all hardcoded color values (#767676, #2D68FF, #EF4444) with
imports from styles/theme.js to ensure consistent theming:

- placeholderTextColor now uses theme.colors.textSecondary
- ActivityIndicator and RefreshControl colors use theme.colors.primary
- shadowColor uses theme.colors.primary or theme.colors.error
- Remove redundant '// Primary blue' comments
title: replace hardcoded colors with theme references
